did.abstract: Correspondence, press releases, and clippings regarding employment opportunities and traning programs for blacks in national defense industries. Principal correspondents: Sidney Hillman and Robert C. Weaver.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Founded Feb. 12. 1909, the NAACP is the nation's oldest, largest and most widely recognized grassroots-based civil rights organization. Its more than half-million members and supporters throughout the United States and the world are the premier advocates for civil rights in their communities, campaigning for equal opportunity and conducting voter mobilization.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Series A- 21 reels "Subject Files on Labor Conditions & Employment Discrimination"; Series B - 25 reels "Cooperation with Organized Labor"; Series C - 12 reels "Legal Department Files on Labor"
